Line 23: Line 23:
Much of the humor comes from the contrasting personalities of the [[Italian American]] Vinny and his girlfriend Mona Lisa Vito, and the more staid Southern townspeople. Pesci gained strong praise for his comedic lead role while Tomei won an [[Academy Awards|Oscar]] for [[Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress|Best Supporting Actress]] for her performance.
Much of the humor comes from the contrasting personalities of the [[Italian American]] Vinny and his girlfriend Mona Lisa Vito, and the more staid Southern townspeople. Pesci gained strong praise for his comedic lead role while Tomei won an [[Academy Awards|Oscar]] for [[Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress|Best Supporting Actress]] for her performance.
â
Additionally, Gwynne, who had long been typecast due to his role as [[Herman Munster]] in the television show ''[[The Munsters]]'', received critical acclaim for his [[Double act|straight man]] performance as Judge Chamberlain Haller. Sadly, he was unable to benefit from his newfound respect, as he developed [[pancreatic cancer]] shortly after filming wrapped and died the following year.
+
Additionally, Gwynne, who had long been typecast due to his role as [[Herman Munster]] in the television show ''[[The Munsters]]'', received critical acclaim for his [[Double act|straight man]] performance as Judge Chamberlain Haller. He was unable to benefit from his newfound respect, as he developed [[pancreatic cancer]] shortly after filming wrapped and died the following year.
The cast also included [[Mitchell Whitfield]], [[Lane Smith]] and [[Bruce McGill]].
The cast also included [[Mitchell Whitfield]], [[Lane Smith]] and [[Bruce McGill]].
